verification_code.subject: Verification code
verification_code.description: all you have to do now is to copy this code and paste at the time you get to access the application and the account will be unlocked :)

forget_password.subject: Reset Password
forget_password.header: You have requested to reset your password.
forget_password.subheader: We cannot just send you the old password, however, a link was provided for you in order to choose a new one, click on the link below and follow the instructions.
forget_password.description: If you did not request it, ignore this email. There is no need to panic, only those who have access to this email can ever change the password.

no_record.title: Sorry but there were no records to be displayed
no_record.subtitle: Add new items or change the searched term

form.error: Something went wrong while processing the request
form.token: The provided code is invalid or expired

code.not_found: The provided code does not match
code.sent: An email was sent to you with the access code

form.email: An email has been sent to you with the instructions to continue

confirmation.title: Action Required
confirmation.content: Before continuing, please check if the item that is being deleted is correct once this action is permanent.

footnote.login: By continuing, you agree with our
footnote.password: A password consided strong must have...

authentication.remember_it: I've remember it! I'd like to go back.

password_policy.case: one lowercase and one uppercase character
